{{(((product.price-product.discountPrice)/product.price)*100).toFixed(0)}}% OFF

import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product', templateUrl: './product.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product.component.css'] }) export class ProductComponent { @Input() product: any; }
